app.name: WhatsApp Notifications
app.short_description: Allows to send proactive messages to Whatsapp.
app.installation_instructions: Smooch/Zendesk should provide you the value for each parameter.

appId.label: Smooch appID or Channel Framework ID

namespace.label: WhatsApp Namespace
namespace.helpText: The namespace is given by Whatsapp on your WABA.

templates.label: Enabled WA templates
templates.helpText: Input the list of WA templates that you want to enable on ZD Support, separated by commas.

language.label: Template language
language.helpText: Language to apply to ALL template (en_US or pt_BR)

notificationAPI.label: Notification API enabled
notificationAPI.helpText: Specify if the Smooch Notification API is enabled for your account.
